thumb.title: Rainy Knight - Back to Rodinia (Official Music Video)
thumb.description: Instagram : Rainyknight_officialTime rewound to the era of Rodinia, and Miya faced a vibrant landscape that contrasted starkly with the high-tech world of the Mother Star. Enormous ancient beasts were several times his size, but Miya's agility helped him avoid many dangers as he continued to follow the scent of Rainy Knights.
